summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2004 BIG DOG MASTIFF.  WHILE DRIVING 45 MPH, THE HEADLIGHTS WENT OUT.  THE CONTACT PULLED INTO A GAS STATION AND INSPECTED THE FUSES AND CIRCUIT BREAKERS.  AFTER SITTING, THE HEADLIGHTS ILLUMINATED.  HE STATED THAT THE HEADLIGHTS OPERATED INTERMITTENTLY.  OCCASIONALLY, THE HIGH BEAMS WOULD ILLUMINATE.  THE CONTACT HAS NOT YET TAKEN THE VEHICLE TO THE DEALER.  THE MANUFACTURER STATED THAT THEY HAD AN ISSUE WITH A LOT OF THE VEHICLES AND THE CONTROL BOXES WERE ON BACK ORDER.   THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 10,200 AND FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 8,000.  UPDATED 04-09-08  *BF

SQUEALING NOISE COMING FROM PRIMARY GETS LOUDER AS IT REACHES NORMAL OPERATING TEMPERATURE. DEALER SAYS THEY DON'T KNOW WHAT IS WRONG. AFTER MANUFACTURER HAD THE BIKE FOR 3 WEEKS, THEY SAID "WE GAVE IT OUR BEST SHOT WITH OUR BEST TECH, HAVE YOUR ATTORNEY CALL US". ONE OF NUMEROUS PROBLEMS NOT FIXED.  *NM
